page.title: 17LANDSCAPE
page.content: The landscape in this area is a mixture of urban and rural sights.In the urban part there is mainly housing and some social services and factories. In the rural area farming is the main form of employment and there are lots of open fields which make_up the landscape. If you stand on top of Garvary and look at the landscape you will see that it is mainly covered in grass(except at the bottom of the drumlins where rushes grow),and the fields are very small and are bordered by high hedges. The rural landscape is mostly made_up of drumlins.Drumlins are small hills made of boulder clay.They were formed thousands of years ago when the whole area was covered with ice;as the ice moved it picked_up clay and rocks (anything in its path)
